Specimen Container(s): Oragene®Dx collection device (OGD-500, OGD-575, OXD-525, OYD-500)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Oragene®Dx saliva collection devices for non-invasive DNA sample collection and stabilization for use in molecular diagnostic applications.
Indications for Use Summary: Non-invasive collection of human saliva samples for DNA isolation and stabilization, suitable for use in FDA cleared molecular diagnostic applications; samples can be collected by spitting or sponge transfer and are stable for long term transport and storage at ambient conditions.
